content: lagunîs a cowl pattern by skeinwalker e-mail skeinwalker@gmail com ravelry & social media skeinwalker www skeinwalker com crystalline waters stretch between emerald islands sheltered lagoons hide their colorful waters like jewels waiting for the light the turquoise depths shift from aquamarine to deeper teal creating a living canvas that changes with each passing cloud seabirds trace graceful arcs through salt-tinged air hopping effortlessly from island to island the lagunîs cowl captures this turquoise journey lace panels mirror bird wings in flight while diamond-shaped motifs echo the view of lagoons from above generous yarn-overs create the airy lightness of ocean breezes the lace flows and merges like converging currents wrap yourself in the serenity of protected waters and let lagunîs transport you to that perfect moment between sea and sky skeinwalker lagunîs 1 © 2025 skeinwalker a note from skeinwalker knitting is much more than just playing with some pretty yarns and stitch patterns knitting is meditation in motion an island of peace in a fast-paced and busy world knitting is connecting with like-minded people all over the world knitting is overcoming our struggles fixing our mistakes and sharing our triumphs stitch by stitch sounds like life i guess it is - this pattern is my gift to you and the knitting community i love if you d like to stay connected and see what i m creating next i d love to have you join my newsletter community join the explorers weekly skeinwalker s newsletter no pressure just an invitation now let s knit -
